snippet.title: Arcade Game: Mrs. Dynamite (1982 Universal)
snippet.description:
A maze game where you run around a labyrinth dodging the monsters while picking up dynamites to place a in a spot to set the dynamites to blow up and destroy them. 

Wow! This predates anything that Bomberman came.  It's like Namco's Warp & Warp with Bomberman thrown in. This game is very influential on many Bomberman games and similar games that game by. After 16 levels, I used the no-hit cheat making me invincible. This game is also endless. After 99 levels, the level counter resets zero since level 100 is zero and level 101 is level one so I quit after this since there's no point in continuing after this.
